subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Axel Teichmann of Germany won a 15-kilometer cross-country race, and Virpi Kuitunen of Finland won the women’s event in the fourth leg of the World Cup’s annual Tour de Ski series in Nove Mesto na Morave, Czech Republic. The races are part of the third edition of the Tour de Ski, which includes seven races in nine days. The overall winner gets 400 World Cup points.
